surface_layer.definition: A DNA repair pathway that utilizes a homologous template to repair DNA double-strand breaks, leading to accurate and precise repair.

deep_layer.mechanism: Uses a homologous DNA sequence as a template to guide the repair process.

capabilities: Precise and accurate repair of double-strand DNA breaks using a homologous template

core_premise: A homologous DNA template provides the necessary information to ensure accurate repair of broken DNA.

precondition: Double-strand break in DNA, presence of a homologous template
effect: Accurate and precise repair of the DNA break

claims.object: Precise and accurate repair of double-strand DNA breaks using a homologous template
